title: Matchsafe, "Vices Theme, with Large Goblet", late 19th century
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Oblong, with curved sides, top and bottom, featuring raised decoration of oversized champagne goblet with image of female's face visible inside, goblet sits on table with large, table-top matchsafe, and burning cigar at table's edge, smoke swirls fill background and extend into lid where there is a champagne bottle and cooked poultry. Reverse slightly concave. Lid hinged on side. Striker on bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Vices Theme, with Large Goblet", late 19th century.
late 19th century. Silver. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1978-146-245.
